item.description:
Join us for Dim Sum at China Pearl in Chinatown. Good food, fun, friends, and practice Chinese conversation. Friends welcome.


Fee: Money to pay for food.

This is new location cause theCT2 Bus does not run on weekends and it's 1/2 mi walk from Kendall to the restaurant.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum at China Pearl in Chinatown
